page.title: 08Housing, Density, Types.
page.content: In a comprehensive survey of the houses in our block we counted a total of 5409 dwellings. The highest housing densities are in Whickham (2060) and Lobley Hill (2360) at l543 and l547 houses per square kilometre. The four squares at the S.E. corner of the block contain 20 houses! The proportions of each type of house in our block are:- Detached ll.l5%; Semis 49.7%; Flats 3.l%; Terrace 20.5%; Bungalow l5.42%. The highest proportion of detached houses is in Whickham (2l60-30%), the lowest in Lobley Hill (2360-l.8%). Lobley Hill however has the highest proportion of semis (2260-78%) while the east end of Sunniside (2l59) has the lowest - 33%. The west end of Sunniside has the most terrace housing (2058-55%) while Whickham's new estates (2060) are 32% bungalows.
